page.title: 01OGWELL & DENBURY 1
page.content:
The main village in our area is Ogwell and is close to a market town called{Newton Abbot,}which is about 3 miles away. We are still in the country and you wouldn't believe that we live so close to a town.We live in a rural area with isolated farms scattered over the countryside. We are close to the motorway and we have railway links nearby.There is a pub in the village called{The Jolly {Sailor}and also a church, a Post Office and a Memorial Hall.There are lots of walks and we are close to the sea which is about 6 miles away.Our part of the country is a lovely place, and well worth a visit.There is another village nearby called{Denbury which has the same conveniences.
Kirstie Thomas Age 11
